Flow.description:
created as part of SFDC-26822 iFrame Framework - New Case Flow 1. Tuesday 12:49am updates 2. Remove the contact criteria only from custom lookup 3. UI Changes for Type Loss and add default values. 4. open Contact and Account with required checked 5. This version: Make Contact Normal required lookup 6. 4April:- Set Priority as low default
Sprint 3 Changes start 9 april 2024 1. Added the deafult Subtype value as NA and make Subtype as mandatory picklist 2. 10 April :- remove the Send Approval Process because now we are sending that from "Case_After_Flows_2" record trigger flow 3. 15th April:- Update the manager check criteria for loss form 4. 24th April :SFDC-27569: 5: 1 May : SFDC-27309 Adding TAA and STM Billing record types 6: 1O May 10 : Initialize product, mps reassign 1 and 2 for issue on the component visibility 7: 13 May 10 : Initialize product, mpsc reassign 3 for issue on the component visibility 7:13 May 10 : Version from fullsndbx 8: 15 May -> Description Field Fix for Service help UAt#88 and UAT#73
Flow.label: Mid-Market Create Case Flow

fields.name: ServiceHelpDescriptionAdditionalValue1
fields.fieldText: Important, attach the policy/policies. Please ensure to include: probationary period, carry over, reset date, and max negative amount.

fields.name: ServiceHelpDescriptionAdditionalValue2
fields.fieldText: Provide employee examples and what overtime should be vs. what is showing currently in Additional Information.

fields.name: ServiceHelpDescriptionAdditionalValue3
fields.fieldText: The earning code must be added to payroll before submitting this request.

fields.name: ServiceHelpDescriptionAdditionalValue4
fields.fieldText: Indicate the details of the updates needed in Additional Information.

fields.name: error_message_no_manager
fields.fieldText: Form requires approval from your manager but the system does not have this information. Please update the Manager on your SF user record or work with the IT team to assist you
